```{r libraries}
library(tidyverse)

```

```{r}
got <- read_csv()
```

```{r}
set.seed(999)
mat = matrix(sample(18, 18), 3, 6)
rownames(mat) = paste0("S", 1:3)
colnames(mat) = paste0("E", 1:6)

df = data.frame(from = rep(rownames(mat), times = ncol(mat)),
    to = rep(colnames(mat), each = nrow(mat)),
    value = as.vector(mat),
    stringsAsFactors = FALSE)

chordDiagram(mat)
chordDiagram(df)
circos.clear()
```
